about_the_game:
The Capsa - Vehicle Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains patterns for Ground Vehicles, Water Vehicles and Mounts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Barrelback Sharky Pattern
  • Barrelback Flames Pattern
  • Barrelback Camo Pattern
  • Pontoon Flame Pattern
  • Pontoon Lightning Pattern
  • Pontoon Flowers Pattern
  • Pontoon Nebula Pattern
  • Pontoon Star Pattern
  • Pontoon Splatter Pattern
  • Barracuda Surf Rescue Pattern
  • Barracuda Camo Pattern
  • Moray Lightning Pattern
  • Moray Flowers Pattern
  • Mako Flowers Pattern
  • Mako Lightning Pattern
  • Victor Police Pattern
  • Scorpion Star Pattern
  • Scorpion Flame Pattern
  • Scorpion Lightning Pattern
  • Scorpion Splatter Pattern
  • Scorpion Nebula Pattern
  • Enforcer Roundel Patterns
  • Horse Skeleton Pattern
detailed_description:
The Capsa - Vehicle Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains patterns for Ground Vehicles, Water Vehicles and Mounts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Barrelback Sharky Pattern
  • Barrelback Flames Pattern
  • Barrelback Camo Pattern
  • Pontoon Flame Pattern

name: Capsa - Vehicle Novelty Patterns Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Onboard graphics chipsets and discrete GPU's not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A SSD or better hard drive is recommended

short_description: The Capsa - Vehicle Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.
